articles.author: Madeleine Haase
articles.title: Following These 5 Sleep Tips Adds Years to Your Life, Study Finds - Prevention Magazine
articles.description: Getting quality Zs could make you 21% less likely to die from cardiovascular disease alone.
articles.content:
• New research suggests that up to 8% of deaths for any reason could be due to suboptimal sleep patterns.
